news.title: BBC on French beach as police slash migrant 'taxi-boat' heading to UK
news.summary: Watch video of French police destroying a boat in the English Channel in a rare and unusual intervention, which police have made clear is not a new tactic.

news.title: Former Arsenal footballer Thomas Partey charged with rape
news.summary: The ex-Arsenal player is charged with five counts of rape relating to two women, and one count of sexual assault over a third woman.

news.title: Israel's strike on bustling Gaza cafe killed a Hamas operative - but dozens more people were killed
news.summary: The attack raises more questions over whether Israelâ€™s use of force is proportionate, as required by international law.

news.title: Crowds mourn Liverpool star Jota in his Portuguese hometown
news.summary: The forward and his brother both died in a car crash in Spain on Thursday.

news.title: Man who told woman to kill herself first to be sentenced under new online safety law
news.summary: Police say Tyler Webb, 23, "repeatedly and persistently" instructed the woman to take her life.
